body_content.explanation: not sharing information with others by speaking, writing, moving your body, or using other signals:
examples: She is studying brain scans of noncommunicating children.
The scientists discussed how to search for non-communicating alien life.

body_content.explanation: Noncommunicating things or parts of things have no connection that allows you to go directly from one into the other:
examples: They can break the reservoirs of oil into noncommunicating sections.
The reaction occurs in two non-communicating areas of the cell.
